message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $135. It's a great opportunity to get it at a slightly higher value than its worth, considering its exceptional quality and benefits. I believe this price reflects its true value and I'm confident you'll find it worthwhile. Let me know if you're interested!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $120? I believe this would be a fair reflection of the product's worth to me.
